=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pet Silk Top Knot Gel (4 Ounce) - Pet Hair Gel for Taming Frizzy Hair & Controlling Flyaways – Dog Anti-Static Lotion Cream with Floral Fragrance – Eliminates Static Charges Review Date: 2017/01/28 Store: PET SILK Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PET SILK', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Cream,Gel', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 2.56 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '844854', 'UPC': '872429001513', 'Manufacturer': 'Pet Silk'} Review Text: This stuff is amazing! I applied a bit of this and all the hair is staying put, LOVE THIS SO MICH! This tub will probably last me awhile but when it's gone I will be back to buy more. Review Title: Keeps puppy and dog fly-away hairs firmly in their bands Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
